name: Shift at Twisters
description:
this is a beta  not finished yet a mix of fnaf 6 and fnaf 3 THIS IS A FANGAME 

i would appreciate all feedback and comments 

CONTROLS-

a-left  door

w-office room

d-vent on the right

f-flashlight

OBJECTIVE: you have to finish all tasks and ward off "intruders" if you hear moving in the vents use the audio lure quick to fend off Funtime Jill if you see somebody at your door use your flashlight twice to block legion from getting into your office, use your system reboots to fix moniter bugging and broken hardware
